name: reatex-server
description: this is the serverside of reactex, a website that help you in remembering all the key information of a specific book. The technic used in this website was created by Robert Greens, the author of the bestselling book called "the 48 laws of power", so i decided to digitilize the process that he created, so that it will be easy to access every key information of all the books that a user read without being overwhelmed by the huge number of carts or whatever.
author: MH-beth
